sentence.Network_en: He is a pigheaded [ bullheaded ] person.
You've old and pigheaded. You don't know what's what.
sentence.Network_cn: 你真被迷了,老昏了,一点也不会想了.

sentence.Network_en: He can be intransigent and pigheaded at times.
sentence.Network_cn: 他有时候会很固执，寸步不让。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 执字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 执牛耳〖 betheacknowledgedleader〗 执拗〖 obstinate;pigheaded;willful〗 执勤〖 beonduty〗.
左字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 左心〖 leftheart〗 左性〖 pigheaded〗 左宜右有〖 versatile〗.
piggywiggy 小猪pigheaded 刚愎的piglet 小猪
拧的多音字怎么组词_百度知道 ... 用力扭转[ twist;screw;wrench] 固执,执拗[ pigheaded] 拧成一股绳 nǐng chéng yī gǔ shéng.

list.abs: You don ' t have to be so pigheaded about everything ., 你用不着对所有的事都那么顽固不化.
He was too pigheaded to listen to reason ., 他执迷不悟 , 听不进道理.
He pigheaded to listen to reason ., 他执迷不悟 , 听不进道理.
that pigheaded old man refused to cooperate with the neighbors那个固执的老头拒绝和邻居合作

entry.def: If you describe someone as pig-headed, you are critical of them because they refuse to change their mind about things, and you think they are unreasonable.

example.ex: She, in her pig-headed way, insists that she is right and that everyone else is wrong.
example.tran: 她固执地坚持认为自己是对的，别人都是错的。

auth_sentence.content: I have become less pigheaded about things and am much more open to change.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have become less pigheaded about things and am much more open to change.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have become less pigheaded about things and am much more open to change.

auth_sentence.content: He always wrote too long; he could be pigheaded; he was a deadline pusher.
auth_sentence.res_content: He always wrote too long; he could be pigheaded; he was a deadline pusher.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He always wrote too long; he could be pigheaded; he was a deadline pusher.

sentences.cn: 他有时候会很固执,寸步不让。
